item.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers/VPS] - Rescue mode
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 19, 09:00 - 10:45 UTC

Dec 15, 18:03 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/12/2022 09:00 UTC 
End time : 19/12/2022 10:45 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to remove options 'rescue64-pro' and 'rescue64-ovh' and replace them by 'rescue-customer' in 'Boot rescue mode' for dedicated and virtual private servers.
To use rescue mode, you can refer to the current link: https://docs.ovh.com/fr/dedicated/ovh-rescue/#en-pratique

item.title: [RBX2][DedicatedServers] - Rack 23A18
item.description:
Dec 18, 12:01 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/12/2022 10:11 UTC
End Time : 18/12/2022 12:00 UTC
Root cause : Electrical malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 18, 10:35 UTC
Identified - Start time : 18/12/2022 10:11 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack 23A18 are no longer responding.
Root cause : Electrical malfunction
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

item.title: [GRA3][Infrastructure] - Cooling System degradation
item.description:
Dec 18, 10:45 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 18/12/2022 10:12 UTC
Service impact : Cooling system performance may for lowered the time being.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
